sn1.70:1: "Kismiṁ loko samuppanno,kismiṁ kubbati santhavaṁ;Kissa loko upādāya,kismiṁ loko vihaññatī"ti.
sn1.70:2: "Chasu loko samuppanno,chasu kubbati santhavaṁ;Channameva upādāya,chasu loko vihaññatī"ti.
sn1.70:3: Nāmaṁ cittañca taṇhā ca,saṁyojanañca bandhanā;Abbhāhatuḍḍito pihito,icchā lokena te dasāti.
